title: Power Min asks imported coal-based plants to run at full capacity till Oct 15
description: The Ministry of Power has instructed all thermal plants using imported coal to operate at full capacity until October 15 to prevent electricity shortages amid surging demand. With the summer season projecting a peak power demand of 260 GW, the move aims to mitigate potential deficits, especially considering the record-high peak power demand of 243 GW in September 2023.
